channel.title: CVE Feed for xstream -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for xstream -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-10173|2024-08-04T22:10:10.018Z -- xstream -- xstream
item.description: It was found that xstream API version 1.4.10 before 1.4.11 introduced a regression for a previous deserialization flaw. If the security framework has not been initialized, it may allow a remote attacker to run arbitrary shell commands when unmarshalling XML or any supported format. e.g. JSON. (regression of CVE-2013-7285)
